# Support

If you need have an issue with the product, please [open a new issue](https://github.com/imliam/smarter-kit/issues/new/choose). If you have an idea or want to ask a question, [start a discussion](https://github.com/imliam/smarter-kit/discussions/new/choose). For reporting security vulnerabilities, see our [security policy](https://github.com/imliam/smarter-kit/blob/main/.github/SECURITY.md).
